cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.problem
Interface Operation

All Known Subinterfaces:
ReversibleOperation
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddOperation, BaseReversibleOperation, FillOperation, MoveOperation, OperationCreated, PourOperation, RemoveOperation, SetFalseOperation, SetTrueOperation, SpillOperation, SwitchCityOperation, UnknownOperation
public interface Operation

Operation is transformation of one attributes to another. Operations are part of definition of every problem.

Method Summary
 Configuration execute(Configuration configuration)
          Executes operation on a attributes.
 

Method Detail

execute

Configuration execute(Configuration configuration)
                      throws InvalidConfigurationException
Executes operation on a attributes.

Creates whole new attributes, no references to the old one are kept (except references via OperationHistory.

Parameters:
configuration - attributes to have operation executed upon
Returns:
new attributes, after operation execution
Throws:
InvalidConfigurationException - if operation is used on configuration which it is unable to modify
